Reviews.Title: Great Phone!!!
Reviews.Author: Mommy2n1 "Jenn"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this phone for my 15 yr old son.  I had purchased a Samsung for myself a few weeks prior and he had been bugging me for an Android phone also.  I am sorry that I didn't wait.  This phone is much nicer and more comfortable to hold.  It upgrades nicely to the newer version of Andriod.  For a kid that is never happy with anything he LOVES this phone and the price could not be beat.

Reviews.Title: The phone is smarter than itself.
Reviews.Author: ola
Reviews.Content: This is a good smart cellphone and very easy to use, all features work well. The battery last long before re-charging.

Reviews.Title: Great phone
Reviews.Author: Danny
Reviews.Content: it's a great phone, the only thing was that I had to update the android os to 2.1, it comes to 1.6

Reviews.Title: european phone
Reviews.Author: jakob
Reviews.Content: Do not buy this phone. I tried to return the phone but the company does not return my email. The phone was made to be used in Europe.  The direction booklet came in German. You can hardly text with this phone because the letters and numbers are so close together. The United States is not one of the countries on the phone. The phone does not do what it is supposed to do. The phone is supposed to have a warranty but I cannot even reach the company.

Reviews.Title: Phone not good for AT&T; 3G service
Reviews.Author: Ierotheos Koufis
Reviews.Content: This phone does not work with the 3G frequency of AT&T.; It is lacking the antenna. AT&T; uses 1900mhz for their 3G network (and recently started using 850mhz as well).The 3G spec of this phone is HSDPA 900 / 2100 and HSDPA 850 / 2100.It works on the AT&T; 2G network.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: simsim7
Reviews.Content: I ordered this phone two days ago and received it in great condition, with a charger and headphones. I'm very happy with it so far, it's very easy to use and the touch key-pad is not at all hard to control and use as I thought it would be. The only minor down side is that you definitely need that SD memory card and that you have to purchase it in order to take pictures, watch videos on youtube or facebook etc. You really can't do much without it. Overall great product, great price too for the wifi and gps services. Very happy with it :)

Reviews.Title: The LG GT540 Optimus/The Android OS Phone
Reviews.Author: Ronald Frelix
Reviews.Content: I was waiting to get a good unlocked phone and I think this is it. This phone give me everything I need in a cell phone. I am very pleased with this phone, the Andrioid OS works just fine and GPS, Touch Screen and camera. All I can say, this one work for me.

Reviews.Title: Perfect advertisement on how not to build a smartphone
Reviews.Author: Abhinav Agarwal "AA"
Reviews.Content: Despite the initial promise, this is one of the worst smartphones I have come across or owned. Ever. I am sure there are worse out there, but that's small consolation.The bad:. The first mobile phone in the more than 13 years that I have been using cell phones where I could not make phone calls because the phone app crashed. Yes. I have got on at least two different occasions error messages stating that the "phone dialer app has crashed". A phone where you cannot make phone calls. I could stop right here and this phone would be deserving of a 1-star rating. But let's plod more.. Slow. Slow. Slow. So many times when I get a call, the display does not light up immediately. It takes 3, 4, 5 seconds or even longer for the display to be lighted so I can even answer the call or see who's calling.. Resistive touch screen that is mostly resistant to light taps and swipes. The touch screen sensitivity and responsiveness are (yet) more huge disappointments.. There are many apps that have been pre-installed by LG and yet I cannot remove them from the phone without hacking the phone.. The Windows software to manage the phone from my computer is, well, terrible, to put it mildly.. Sloooow camera. It can take several seconds from the time you tap the on-screen button to take the photo that it actually takes the photo.. The camera is very basic. Average quality in bright sunlight. Very mediocre results otherwise. I cannot also share multiple photos at a time. I know there are Android photo apps available that make are quite good, but surely providing a simple yet functional camera app shouldn't be asking for much.. The slider to move from camera to video mode is such that several times upon tapping to take a photo I end up sliding the switch to the video mode.. Mediocre battery life. This may be common enough with Android phones, from what I hear, but still... with just 3G on, and no WiFi, Bluetooth, or GPS, I still need to charge the phone every day and a half.. While on the subject of battery, what is truly surreal is to plug the phone into the charger, and then within 5 seconds the battery level shoots from 30% to 40% to 50% and then to 80%. Yes, evidently some sort of magic fast-charge capability exists on this phone that can charge the phone upto 80% in five seconds.. The keyboard is also not very well designed. It is very easy to tap a key and have another one be pressed.. Heavy. It is heavy. Yes.. No Android update available. This is running Android 2.1, and I cannot updgrade to 2.2, or 2.3.. And so on... almost every aspect of the phone is a disappointment.. I got a Samsung SA-S5360 Cellphone - US Warranty - Gray phone a few weeks back, and it cost 2/3 the price of this LG monstrosity, and is much, much better on so many aspects than the LG that I realized just how bad this LG has been.The good:. Well, not much, really. This is a most disappointing phone.

Reviews.Title: Good price to quality balance
Reviews.Author: S. Jayawardane "Empty"
Reviews.Content: It's a great phone for the price.I bought this for my sister in Sri Lanka. Nokia's are the "it" phone there and she kept asking for a Nokia. But I sent her this android and she was amazed to discover the power of Android.The four stars are because it is for her. She has never used a capacitative touch screen so the response of the resistive screen is good for her. On the other hand if it was for me I would give it two stars. I have almost the same phone, sprint lg optimus, and I am used to it's capacitative touch screen. This phone drove me nuts when I tried to set it up. I finally went and bought a six pack of Nintendo DS stylus's and was able to operate the phone decently with them. They should have put a stylus holder slot on this phone and it would have been perfect.Also I noticed the screen scratches easily. I took utmost care and there was tiny scratches by the time I shipped the phone to my sister.Given all this it is the best phone available for upright price. I haven't heard anything negative about it from my sister.

Reviews.Title: garbage
Reviews.Author: mac
Reviews.Content: i have nothing positive to say about this other than the battery life, while not using the thing! if your on it more than a few times a day it only last for the day. if you dont use it much at all.. the battery has lasted me up to 3 days before... but other than that the keyboard is horrible, i cant sms or hardly even call the buttons are small and you have to press to hard. i constantly am fighting the buttons....  I WOULDNT WASTE YOUR MONEY!

Reviews.Title: Good entry level smartphone
Reviews.Author: Dewey Y. Moy "dymoy"
Reviews.Content: I've had this phone for about 4 weeks now and overall, it's a pretty good entry level smartphone.  It is an International version, and comes with the opening screen in German.  I would recommend connecting to LG's UK site to download any software upgrades and the English manual, unless you are fluent in German.  I was able to set it up with T-Mobile fairly easily once I had the necessary codes (see the user forum).  The WiFi is OK although it doesn't connect all the time (I did see a warning somewhere that it doesn't connect in the US although I am able to in most instances if there's little or no security).  The only annoying thing is that you need to unlock the keypad after placing the phone call.  If you're prompted to enter information like a PIN or answer questions via a keyed response, it's a little bit of a pain to unlock the keypad each time.

Reviews.Title: Great for browsing
Reviews.Author: GS "GS"
Reviews.Content: I would give this phone 10 on 10 for looks, ease of use and portability. It is very user friendly with a great touch screen. Browsing capability is comparable to more expensive android phones.Facebook, gmail and few other applications come pre installed.  But if you keep your applications on the inbuilt memory,even a few applications can be a lot for this little phone.My only complaint is the phone application. It is slow open and is not very responsive.Overall, good device for the money.

Reviews.Title: Good telephone.
Reviews.Author: Jose Sanabria
Reviews.Content: Very good cost - performance. It seems a very good device. It would be good that the offer out with a newer version of android.

Reviews.Content: was slow to boot and the touch response was one of the slowest i've ever experienced (not the worst though because that was made by a company that's now defunct) on top of that we ordered 2 and one had a bad batteryHOWEVER the seller was very understanding and refunded the money quickly after we returned them so the seller got a 5 star review because it's not his fault the phone isn't very good

Reviews.Title: THIS NICE CELL PHONE FOR THE BEGINEER
Reviews.Author: Luis J. Hernandez
Reviews.Content: This cell phone is nice good looking easy to use i no have problem with el cell for used in muy country

Reviews.Title: Excellent value for money
Reviews.Author: dmore
Reviews.Content: I bought this to gift some one, but I used it for couple of days and I really loved it. The display and touch screen is very good and responsive. Since this is android lots of apps are preinstalled and you can add more from market. Battery life is little less but enought for the day.It has very less internal memory so external card is must buy with this. This is a great gift for some one who non techie.

Reviews.Title: BAD product, cames with factory deffect
Reviews.Author: William
Reviews.Content: The product needs recall, every time that you restart, it change the language to German...I bought three with the same problem!!!

Reviews.Title: A nice price with nice usage
Reviews.Author: Joycc
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone during Thanksgiving break. After I started using it, it is a pretty good android however there are several problems that exist:1. Too little internal storage space--> Because this phone is running android 1.6, therefore ALL the apps need to be stored in the phone storage. I only have about 15-20 apps, and that's it... I wanted more, but if I want more apps, I need to update to at least android 2.2 in order to put my apps in SD card.2. Android 1.6 upgrade--> I downloaded the LG Mobile Upgrade and tried to upgrade my phone to 2.1, however that didn't work out, because the phone is unlocked phone, and I couldn't find the phone model in the list, so I couldn't update. This is a really big problem for me. In addition, because I have international warranty for this phone, if I root the phone and upgrade it by myself, I will lose the warrranty, so I am stuck with this right now.3. Internet--> The internet and Wi-Fi itself is not a big problem, but sometimes when I want to go to another site and I touched the button, it appears  "STOPPING...", and the internet could never works (it could not open the page) unless I shut down the phone and turn it on again. THIS REALLY BOTHERS ME!!!!So far, the phone is pretty good and with a good price~

Reviews.Title: Ok but can't seem too download a few apps I wanted.
Reviews.Author: Eli
Reviews.Content: I hate that I can't download PANDORA! ;( and also a few apps I wanted from the Android Market, also that without no ear-buds or headphones I can't play the RADIO.

Reviews.Title: nice phone, great design
Reviews.Author: younes
Reviews.Content: This phone is really nice looking. It has all the things I need like WIFI, android apps, 3mpix camera etc.Pros: Great looking phone. I get compliments all the time about the look of the phonethe battery is finethe android system was updated when i received the phoneCons:the android system gets slow sometimesthe keypad automatically locks on in the middle of a callBut all in all, a simple nice looking smartphone

Reviews.Title: Hate the keyboard. Not as great as I initially thought
Reviews.Author: J. Mathis "Jilly"
Reviews.Content: This phone sucks. I have had it for 4 months now and its not as great as I initially thought. The keys suck and its hard to type. The touchscreen is delayed and its hard to unlock the phone or do anything with the touchscreen. Also keep getting errors saying my SD card was unexpectedly removed then oneday I lost all my pics and vidoes somehow. Issues connecting to internet though none of my settings changed. Just a overall mess. Didnt give it one star cause it ws cheap. You get what you pay for. I READY SEE THAT THE PRICE WENT UP FROM WHEN I BOUGHT IT.I HOPE ITS BECAUSE THEY FIXED THE PROBLEMS.PROS:The phone was unlocked as promised .

Reviews.Title: Worst quality ever
Reviews.Author: Gonzalo
Reviews.Content: I bought this cell phone in June 2011. At first, it worked fine, but after a few days I realized it has a lot of problems:1)It is impossible to unlock. I tried all the possible ways for doing it, but it never worked.2)It is the slowest cell phone I've ever had. It takes between 30 secs - 1 min to play music. I have even missed calls because it takes too long to load the "calling screen"3)After 4 months, an unexpected error ocurred and it doesn't let me open any application (or even the menu) and it doesnt hav reception anymore.4) I tried to use the international warranty at LG because I was traveling, but they didnt accept it.In conclusion, it is a very bad quality cell phone and it never worked well. At least, it's cheap for being an Android, but  Google should regulate companies like LG so that they don't create cell phones like these.

Reviews.Title: Good device, bad support
Reviews.Author: Whytheman
Reviews.Content: Ordered this phone with warranty from BLUTEKUSA and they have the worst customer service. Called them up and I was stuck leaving my name and phone number at voicemail. It has already been a week and they haven't responded yet.The phone is great, it already comes with the 2.1 update and it works wonders.
